popularityCurve.label: the new more convenient opening hours at armidale donor centre will provide individuals schools community groups and businesses in and around armidale with the opportunity to help save even more lives

clusterList.phrase: the new more convenient opening hours at armidale donor centre will provide individuals schools community groups and businesses in and around armidale with the opportunity to help save even more lives

the new opening hours will allow us to better service the local community and will also help to ensure we continue to meet the ever increasing demand for blood and blood products not only at a local level but nation-wide
